'''Lord of the Rings: The Duel''' is one of the first [[Middle-earth]] action games.<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/duel.html The Lord of the Rings: The Duel] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 8 April 2011)</ref><ref name="El Anillo">[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=GEN&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=8 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 9 (retrieved 8 April 2011)</ref> In the game two players need to fight each other. The players can choose from several [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] characters: [[Gandalf]], [[Gollum]], [[Samwise Gamgee|Sam]] and [[Nazgûl|a Ring Wraith]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref name="El Anillo"/> There are three locations where the players can fight: [[Lothlórien]], [[Rivendell]] and a Swamp of [[Mordor]]. The game is designed by [[Tim Winsky]],<ref>[http://www.twinskygames.com/ TwinSky Games], About (retrieved 10 April 2011)</ref> under his old alias ''Tatsumakisenpukyaku III''.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/> The game is freeware<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref>[http://tieba.baidu.com/f?kz=177120564 Baidu, 托尔金相关游戏简介] (retrieved 8 April 2011)</ref> and downloadable [http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/program/LOTR.ZIP here].
